mapper.select: select count(*) from schedule where sid=#{sid}
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(sid, subject_name, major, credit, subject_first_day, subject_first_hour, subject_second_day, subject_second_hour, place) values(#{sid}, #{subject_name}, #{major}, #{credit}, #{subject_first_day}, #{subject_first_hour}, #{subject_second_day}, #{subject_second_hour}, #{place})
mapper.delete: delete from schedule where sno=#{sno} and sid=#{sid}
